com.btr.proxy.util
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  com.btr.proxy.util.Logger

public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Simple logging support for the framework. You need to add an logging listener that needs to send the logging events to an backend.

Author:
Bernd Rosstauscher (proxyvole@rosstauscher.de) Copyright 2009

Nested Class Summary
static interface Logger.LogBackEnd
          Interface for an logging backend that can be attached to the logger.

public static Logger.LogBackEnd getBackend()
Gets the currently attached logging backend.

log

public static void log(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                       Logger.LogLevel loglevel,
                       java.lang.String msg,
                       java.lang.Object... params)
Logs a message.

Parameters:
clazz - the class that sends the log message.
loglevel - the logging level.
msg - the message format string.
params - the message parameters for the format string.

isLogginEnabled

public static boolean isLogginEnabled(Logger.LogLevel logLevel)
Can be used to test if a given logging level is enabled.

Parameters:
logLevel - the loglevel to test.
Returns:
true if enabled, else false.
